name: Hunting Hour
description:
A CS50's Project

This game was made as a CS50's Introductory project. You control "Scratch"(The website mascot), and your goal is to catch as many as possible, without being caught by the dog.

Play this game directly in Scratch's website:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/417131415/

You can download the source code archive, to use it on scratch if you want it.
